growthexperiments-homepage-specialpage-t:
Title for Special:Homepage. Parameters:
* $1 - Name of the current user. Can be used with GENDER.
prefs-homepage: Text of the section header for the "Newcomer homepage" preference section.
growthexperiments-homepage-enable: Text of the preference to display the homepage tab along with user and talk.
growthexperiments-homepage-pt-link: Text of the preference to make the username link in the personal tools go to the homepage instead of the userpage.
